name: Mobile First - Uses viewport meta tag
message: Include a viewport meta tag to ensure proper responsive behavior

name: Mobile First - Viewport content is correct
message: The viewport meta tag should include width=device-width and initial-scale=1

name: Media Queries - Uses mobile breakpoint
message: Include a media query for mobile devices (max-width: 768px)

name: Media Queries - Uses tablet breakpoint
message: Include a media query for tablets (min-width: 768px)

name: Media Queries - Uses desktop breakpoint
message: Include a media query for desktop (min-width: 1024px)

name: Layout - Uses fluid container
message: Container should have a max-width instead of fixed width

name: Images - Uses responsive images
message: Images should have max-width: 100% to ensure they scale properly

name: Typography - Uses relative units
message: Use relative units like rem for text sizes

name: Navigation - Has mobile menu toggle
message: Include a toggle button for mobile navigation

name: Flexbox/Grid - Uses flexible layout system
message: Use a flexible layout system (like grid or flexbox) for responsive designs
